Title: Destructive earthquake emergency response propaganda charts
Notes: "Destructive earthquake emergency response propaganda charts" (破坏性应急宣传挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1995. The set is bilingual: Chinese and Arabic.Titled "Moderately strong earthquake brings disaster to society" (中强地震 祸及社会), the poster shows post-quake destruction. The subtitle reads "A moderately strong earthquake refers to an earthquake event that causes a certain number of casualties and economic losses" (中强地震，时指造成一定数量的人员伤亡和经济损失的地震事件).
